sense.gloss: COVID-19 pandemic, coronavirus crisis, COVID-19 crisis

sdata.j: 「おバカチックな↑質問↑↓しつもん↓していい？これなんて↑読↑↓よ↓むの？コロナ・・・？うず？なべ？↑違↑↓ちが↓うよね」「|コロナか|」「あっ、『か』なんだ」「もっとテレビも↑見↑↓み↓た↑方↑↓ほう↓がいいと↑思↑↓おも↓うよ」
sdata.e: Is it ok if I ask a stupid question? Can you read this? korona... uzu? nabe? or something else? "koronaka" "Ah, ka" "I think you should be watching more TV."
